metadata.name: Kit for the Preparation of Technetium Tc99m Sestamibi 1 mg 10mL Injection

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Technetium Tc 99m Sestamibi is indicated for 1 detecting coronary artery disease by localizing myocardial ischemia reversible defects and infarction non reversible defects and 2 evaluating myocardial function and developing information for use in patient management decisions

contraindications.disease: The following adverse reactions have been reported in 0 5 of patients signs and symptoms consistent with seizure occurring shortly after administration of the agent transient arthritis angioedema arrhythmia dizziness syncope abdominal pain vomiting and severe hypersensitivity characterized by dyspnea hypotension bradycardia asthenia and vomiting within two hours after a second injection of Technetium Tc 99m Sestamibi A few cases of flushing edema injection site inflammation dry mouth fever pruritis rash urticaria and fatigue have also been attributed to administration of the agent

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Technetium Tc 99m sestamibi can be increased when it is combined with Ranolazine
